author: sstreet
title: Lyon to ‚Äòsue 15-year-old boy for taking selfie with Memphis Depay and Alexandre Lacazette‚Äô during 4-2 win
text:
Comments LYON have shocked football fans in France by suing a 15-year-old‚Ä¶ for taking a selfie. 
An elated young fan ran on the pitch after his team came from 2-1 down to beat Dijon 4-2. 3 A young Lyon fan takes a selfie with Alexandre Lacazette (centre) and Memphis Depay (right) 
And he was delighted when he managed to get a photo with heroes Alexandre Lacazette and Memphis Depay . 
But just when everyone seemed happy, the French club decided to come down hard on the supporter. Sued for a selfie‚Ä¶ @OL_English are taking a 15-year-old fan to court! üò≥ #BTEFS https://t.co/HIXk1qWUSG 
‚Äî BT Sport Football (@btsportfootball) February 26, 2017 
They have chosen to take the youngster to court, BT Sport‚Äôs European Football Show revealed. 
French journalist Julien Laurens sarcastically told the show: ‚ÄúI think you need to kick out the hooligans from stadiums.‚Äù Getty Images Lacazette celebrates scoring for Lyon AP:Associated Press 3 Memphis Depay revelled in the comeback win over Dijon 
He added: ‚ÄúThis young boy is 15. He wanted to celebrate with his heroes Memphis Depay and Alexandre Lacazette after they scored their fourth goal against Dijon last week. 
‚ÄúSo he ran on the pitch, took a selfie with Lacazette and now Lyon are taking him to court, suing him! 
‚ÄúHe said ‚ÄòI was so happy, I didn‚Äôt really think‚Äô and now he has to meet the club in court.‚Äù Memphis Depay sings and dances at new club Lyon's initiation
